author: mtosi
body:
as requested/suggested by tracking POG ( @VinInn @rovere @makortel )
I've just updated/fixed the selection applied to the numerator and denominator used for the definition of "good tracks" in the sub set of plots of the tracking DQM

I tested this update by running
`runTheMatrix -l limited`
and I encouraged few failing jobs w/ exit code 256
which should not be related to this PR ... right ?
title: fix num and den selection for the fractionOfGoodTracks plots [tracking DQM]
